title: How to Clean Your Dishwasher With Kool Aid

steps.headline: Purchase unsweetened lemonade Kool-Aid.
steps.description: It must be this flavor only because of its citric acid content and lack of color. If you like lemonade, buy enough for a drink and a clean!

steps.headline: Sprinkle the entire single package of Kool-Aid into the dishwasher powder holder.
Remove any dishes in the dishwasher.
steps.description: The method should run using an empty machine only.

steps.headline: Run a normal cycle wash.
steps.description: The lemonade Kool-Aid will clean away as it runs through the cycle.

steps.headline: Use the dishwasher as usual after cleaning.
steps.description: It should be free of iron stains and lime deposits after the Kool-Aid clean.
